name: Worm's Aim Trainer
description:
Worm's Aim Trainer is a Free to Play game to help improve your aiming capabilities in any FPS Game.

[FEATURES]:

Crosshair  Customization

Target Customization

Changeable volume for Hit and Miss Sounds.

[CONTROLS]:

Left Mouse Button - FIRE

Thanks and Enjoy.

Now get out there and TRAIN!
